item.title: Circle of Friends
item.description: User flow-chart. Summary Circle of Friends is a pre-facebook, online social photo sharing game made with PHP and MySQL. A circle of friends is formed, the moderator decides on a theme, and then all the members of the circle must post a photo in order to make the round of photos available. If any of the members do not post a photo, the circle will “die” and the photos never become visible.
